title: TypeCulture News
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080608221127/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 2.Jun.2008 11.23am 

[TypeCulture](http://web.archive.org/web/20080608221127/http:/www.typeculture.com/) has just posted Daniel Rhatigan’s impressive master’s dissertation on the complex issues involved in the creation (or adaptation) of typefaces for setting mathematical notation.
author: Miss Tiffany
